page.title: 16Atlantic College Languages
page.content: All students have to learn one foreign language.Many students continue learning one which they have already started in another school.It is possible to start a new language (Spanish,Russian,Chinese and sometimes Italian).This year 1984-1985 some students are studying Japanese and Dutch,but not as beginners.If the students work well they will have achieved a sound knowledge of it by the end of a two year course and will pass the INTERNATIONAL BACCALAUREATE with a good grade at higher or subsidiary knowledge. It is not easy to learn a new language once a pupil has left school.Usually lessons are expensive and difficult to find the time.There are many pieces of equipment to help the students:a language lab.,short wave radio and a computer.
